description: When a patient enters new data in the Medications section of Your Health Record in the web-based chart system, a new record is created in this table. NOTE: this is patient-entered data and is not part of the patient's official medical record.

columns.name: INFO_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the "Your Health Record" medication record.

columns.name: MYPT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the web-based chart system account that is associated with the "Your Health Record" medication record.

columns.name: MYC_MED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the web-based chart system medication that the patient selected. NOTE: If the patient entered a custom medication, then this field will be blank.

columns.name: MYC_MED_ID_MED_NAME
columns.description: The name of the web based chart system medication.

columns.name: INSTRUCTIONS
columns.description: The medication instructions, as entered by the web-based chart system patient.

columns.name: MED_PROV
columns.description: The provider who prescribed the medication, as entered by the web-based chart system patient.

columns.name: MED_COMMENT
columns.description: Any text entered into the medication comments field by the web-based chart system patient.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: The date and time that this record was pulled into enterprise reporting

columns.name: MYC_MED_ID_OTHER
columns.description: If the web-based chart system patient entered a custom medication (meaning one that couldn't be matched to a record in the CL_MYC_MED table), then the name of the custom medication is stored in this field.

columns.name: MYC_MED_ID_OTHER_MED_NAME
columns.description: The name of the web based chart system medication.

columns.name: MED_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The medication status category number for the "Your Health Record" medication record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Deleted
